class.name: com.rawabi.model.ProductOffering
class.comment: Container class for bundling services and associating rated billing events to. A product offering has associated accounts. A product offering is essentially what is available for customers to purchase from the service provider.

column.name: SERVICE_PROVIDER_ID
column.comment: Object ID for Service Provider

column.name: SWEEP_TIER_FLAG
column.comment: T to enable sweep tiers for this offering

column.name: FIRST_BILLED_AS_FIRST_USE_FLAG
column.comment: T to use first billed call as the first use event

column.name: IVR_ANI_REG_FLAG
column.comment: ÀTÀ to allow ANI self registration via IVR

column.name: EMAIL_FLAG
column.comment: T = Email notification sent upon active status

column.name: CREDIT_CARD_VALID_FLAG
column.comment: T = Credit Card must be validated when a subscriber signs up

column.name: REQUIRE_ANI_AUTH_FLAG
column.comment: T/F indicates whether postpaid calling subscriber can be validated via DTMF (F) or only by ANI lookup

column.name: DELETED_FLAG
column.comment: Used to mark a product offering record as delete so it does not show up in the GUIs

column.name: POPD_RATE_CALLS_FLAG
column.comment: if T, apply rates to postpaid calls

column.name: POPD_CREDIT_LIMIT_FLAG
column.comment: if T, apply credit limits

column.name: ACCESS_NUM_OFFERING_REQUIRED
column.comment: make sure access number is linked to sub's offering or pin/passcode/account number. If access number is not associated and this flag is set to T, block call

column.name: BAL_XFER_DISABLE_SUB
column.comment: Flag indicating whether or not we disable a pin after transferring the balance from it. T = disable pin, F = do not disable pin.

column.name: IVR_ACCT_BAL_UNITS_FLAG
column.comment: If T, account balance stated in units instead of currency when in IVR.

column.name: FIRM_CREDIT_LIMIT_FLAG
column.comment: If T, apply firm credit limits instead of hard credit limits.

column.name: IMMEDIATE_THRESHOLD_PAY_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether the offering supports immediate threshold payments.

column.name: RESTRICT_AUTH_ANI_FLAG
column.comment: This indicates whether the offering is restricting the number of ANIs allowed for this offering. Default value is F

column.name: START_LOT_SEQ_ZERO_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates if the first lot serial number should start with a 0 or 1.

column.name: AUTO_PAY_FLAG
column.comment: T - offers the subscriber the option of having his credit usage paid off automatically by charging the active credit card when the credit limit is reached. F - This feature is not available.

column.name: SHARED_USE_FLAG
column.comment: Flag to indicate whether shared use billing is available for this offering. T - shared use billing allowed F - single use billing only.

column.name: PP_MIN_BALANCE
column.comment: minimum prepaid balance required to place a call

column.name: PP_MAX_BALANCE
column.comment: number, maximum prepaid balance allowed on the system

column.name: MIN_RECHARGE
column.comment: minimum cc recharge amount

column.name: MAX_RECHARGE
column.comment: maximum cc recharge amount

column.name: BILLING_TYPE
column.comment: 1= Prepaid Product Offering; 2=Postpaid Product Offering

column.name: CC_MAX_SUBWEEK
column.comment: maximum total recharge per sub per week

column.name: CC_MAX_SUBMONTH
column.comment: maximum total recharge per sub per month

column.name: CC_MAX_CARDWEEK
column.comment: maximum total recharge per cc per week

column.name: CC_MAX_CARDMONTH
column.comment: maximum total recharge per cc per month

column.name: POPD_CREDIT_LIMIT
column.comment: max currency amount sub is allowed to use per period

column.name: CLM_BAL_RESET_DAY
column.comment: day of month on which credit limits will reset

column.name: DIALING_PLAN_ID
column.comment: Specifies the dialing plan to use for calls made by subscribers associated with this product offering. If not specified, the dialing plan at the access number dictates dialing plan. If not specified for a broadband calling service, north American dialing plan is assumed.

column.name: CC_RECHARGE_AMOUNT5
column.comment: Credit card recharge option 5

column.name: CC_RECHARGE_AMOUNT6
column.comment: Credit card recharge option 6

column.name: CREDIT_LIMIT_WARNING
column.comment: If this percentage of a subscriber credit limit is reached an email notification is sent out

column.name: MINIMUM_INITIAL_BALANCE
column.comment: Description: the minimum balance that a subscriber must have when signing up for an offering.

column.name: IMMEDIATE_THRESHOLD_PAY_PCT
column.comment: The percentage of the credit limit that needs to be exceeded for the immediate payment to occur.

column.name: MAX_AUTH_ANI_ALLOWED
column.comment: This indicates the number of authorized ANIs allowed per subscriber associated with this offering. Value can be 0 or greater.

column.name: AUTO_PAY_THRESHOLD_PCT
column.comment: The percent threshold of the subscriber's credit limit which triggers an automatic full payment of the subscriber's credit usage.

column.name: CREDIT_THRESHOLD
column.comment: The threshold required to activate a subscriber after a credit check.

column.name: MAX_EXTENSIONS
column.comment: The maximum number of broadband extensions a company can have.

column.name: MAX_DID
column.comment: The maximum number of DIDs (i.e., outside lines) a company can have.

column.name: COUNTRY_ID
column.comment: An optional country the product offering is limited to.

column.name: BILLING_LEVEL
column.comment: The billing level for this offering: 1 - subscriber billing 2 - corporate.

column.name: TIME_RESERVE_AMOUNT
column.comment: Amount of currency to reserve in shared-used billing scenarios.

column.name: CURRENCY_RESERVE_AMOUNT
column.comment: Amount of currency to reserve in shared-used billing scenarios.

column.name: CARRIER_CODE
column.comment: Yes Used by application to distinguish calls generated by prepaid subscriber from calls generated by postpaid subscribers.

column.name: NAME
column.comment: Name of offering provided by Service Provider

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.comment: Offering description provided by Service Provider
